roles.name: Helpdesk administrator
roles.description: Can reset passwords for non-administrators and Helpdesk administrators.

roles.name: License administrator
roles.description: Ability to assign, remove and update license assignments.

roles.name: User administrator
roles.description: Can manage all aspects of users and groups, including resetting passwords for limited admins.

roles.name: Service support administrator
roles.description: Can read service health information and manage support tickets.

roles.name: Directory readers
roles.description: Can read basic directory information. Commonly used to grant directory read access to applications and guests.

roles.name: Global reader
roles.description: Can read everything that a global administrator can, but not update anything.
